com.example.joshua.ljc.DataModel.Interfaces

Interface IProject

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Project

    public interface IProject
extends java.io.Serializable
    Created by Joshua on 27/03/2017. This interface ensures that objects which implement it, contain the necessary methods to perform the actions of a "Construction Project".

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getDescription()
      Gets a project's description.
      java.lang.String getImage()
      Returns the Fire base key used to store the projects data.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Gets a projects title, this is the caption held in the list view UI.
      java.lang.String getUUID()
      Gets the projects Fire Base key value.
      void setDescription(java.lang.String description)
      Sets a projects description.
      void setName(java.lang.String title)
      Sets the caption of a project, which is used as an overlay for both the website and mobile application.

    • Method Detail

      • getUUID

        java.lang.String getUUID()
        Gets the projects Fire Base key value. This is needed to perform updates and removals.
        Returns:
        String value which represents the documents key (Document store).

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Gets a projects title, this is the caption held in the list view UI.
        Returns:
        String value of the projects title.

      • setName

        void setName(java.lang.String title)
      throws java.lang.Exception
        Sets the caption of a project, which is used as an overlay for both the website and mobile application.
        Parameters:
        title - This is the new caption's String value.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - This exception is used to ensure that the String meets the minimum requirements e.g. length.

      • getDescription

        java.lang.String getDescription()
        Gets a project's description. The description is subject to the users interpretation.
        Returns:
        String value of the project's description.

      • setDescription

        void setDescription(java.lang.String description)
             throws java.lang.Exception
        Sets a projects description. This description must conform to the included constraints.
        Parameters:
        description - String value of the new description.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - This exception is thrown when the new description doesn't meet the pre-defined requirements.

      • getImage

        java.lang.String getImage()
        Returns the Fire base key used to store the projects data. The reason for this is that the projects image is held under the same value inside of Fire Base storage.
        Returns:
        String value which represents the projects Fire Base key / ImageID.
